SEO.title: Geobint Web
SEO.description: Explore the Jerez City Council geoportal. Access maps, catalogs, and geographic services to boost Jerez's development.

Cookies.body: We use cookies to ensure the best experience for the user on our website. If you continue to use this site, we will assume that you agree.

Main.subTitle: Welcome to the Geoportal
Main.title: Spatial Data Infrastructure of the Jerez City Council
Main.body: Access, combine, and transform geographic data with a Spatial Data Infrastructure

Mapas.subTitle: Map Viewer
Mapas.body: Viewing area for all available maps for consultation

Directorio.title: Service Directory
Directorio.body: Catalog area of services available to citizens

BottomSection.title: Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) of Jerez City Council
BottomSection.body: A Spatial Data Infrastructure (SDI) is an integrated information system consisting of a set of resources dedicated to managing geographical information and available online, to foster interoperability and allow users, using a browser, to use and combine them according to their needs, promoting social, economic, and environmental development of the territory

DirectorioContent.title: WMS
DirectorioContent.body: Service for real-time visualization of public parking in the city of Jerez de la Frontera, showing their location and occupancy levels.

DirectorioContent.title: WMS
DirectorioContent.body: Detailed zoning polygons of the current planning.

DirectorioContent.title: WMS
DirectorioContent.body: Detailed numbering of building entrances in Jerez de la Frontera.

DirectorioContent.title: WMS
DirectorioContent.body: Identification of urban road segments along with their names.

DirectorioContent.title: WMS
DirectorioContent.body: Network of urban climate sensors in the city of Jerez de la Frontera providing updated data on temperature, humidity, and atmospheric pressure.
